data.similar:
none in CPAN, but PowerEdge::RAC is similar
    (http://lanceerplaats.nl/PowerEdge/RAC/)
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This was discussed briefly on the CPAN modules list, and it seems
    that no other high-level area is appropriate for these modules. The
    first under this name space will be "SystemManagement::GSP", which I
    will upload as soon as this namespace is approved. After that, the
    PowerEdge::RAC author may update his module name to follow the
    convention, and upload it to CPAN as well. I will be following up in
    the coming months with additional system management modules, as I
    mentioned in my original posting:

    http://www.xray.mpe.mpg.de/cgi-bin/w3glimpse2html/modules/2003-11/msg00193.html?58#mfs
